name: Mo's Adventure
description:
What do you do when you want to visit your grandmother's house but the bridge is closed? Make a potion of course! Explore Mo's world and collect ingredients to make one of two potions that will help you cross the river!

This is the first game I have ever made and though I am proud of it, it may still have some bugs >_<

I appreciate all (kind) comments and suggestions!

Check out my website if you'd like

Created by Rachel Chow

12/12/19
